about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Infonative Solutions Ltd specializes in custom learning development solutions for corporate and educational sectors.

The company focuses on developing and designing eLearning content, and services, including offering cloud-based learning management systems (LMS) and other related products.

The company specializes in bespoke e-learning solutions, consulting, courseware, and off-the-shelf content, with expertise in LMS, instructional design, gamification, AR/VR-based content, and software simulations.

The company provides cutting-edge e-learning delivery services to clients including Fortune 500 companies, Big 4 consulting firms, IT/ITES, education, and government agencies in industries like BFSI, consulting, and FMCG.

Services:

  • Training Solutions: Product Training, Leadership Training, Behavioural Training, and Onboarding Training.
  • Assessing the current program: To analyze gaps in terms of updated content, technical feasibility, geographical distribution, and training delivery.
  • Profiling audience: Training mode (self-paced, virtual instructor-led, or blended) depends on the sales staff's needs, devices, and time.
  • Building a prototype: To give a first-hand perspective of the output and then do full-scale development once the prototype is approved.

Products:

  • MindScroll LMS:A cloud-based, mobile-responsive Learning Management System for delivering and managing online training.
  • Off-The-Shelf Courses: Pre-designed courses covering topics like soft skills, data visualization, and insurance sales.
  • eLearning Market:A platform offering customizable eLearning templates, vector icons, and music for diverse project needs.

As of March 31, 2024, and as of September 30, 2024, the company had a total strength of 154 and 157 employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced Promoters and Qualified Senior Management Team
  • Scalable Business Model
  • Commitment to Meeting Market Needs
  • Expanding the Off the Shelf Library

faqs.question: What is the Infonative Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Infonative Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 3128000 equity shares of the face value of ₹1 aggregating up to ₹24.71 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹79 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on March 28, 2025, and closes on April 3, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Infonative Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Infonative Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Infonative Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Infonative Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Infonative Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Infonative Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Infonative Solutions IPO opens on March 28, 2025 and closes on April 3, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Infonative Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Infonative Solutions IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Infonative Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Infonative Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Infonative Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Infonative Solutions IPO will be done on Friday, April 4, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, April 7, 2025. Check the Infonative Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Infonative Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Infonative Solutions IPO listing date is on Tuesday, April 8, 2025.
